participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and reflective, often struggles but remains hopeful.
participant_1.background: i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a 45 year old male. i now live in the city. i grew up on a farm.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: outgoing and passionate about music, enjoys sharing stories and experiences.
participant_2.background: i grew up in the industry. we spent summers ring at national parks. i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats.
